question: I have many old music CD's, video tapes, DVD's, video games, etc.I wanted to know if I can sell all these things
answer:
QUESTION
I have many old music CD's, video tapes, DVD's, video games, etc. that I have, Alhamdu-Lillah stop indulging in. I wanted to know if I can sell all these things to someone and use the money as Sadaqah or Musjid or to buy Islaamic books, etc.
If I sell these things, will it count as Haraam income.
ANSWER


Share:

If you sell these items, the income would be Haraam. You should give this in charity without the intention of reward from Allah Taâ€™ala.

And Allah knows best.

Was Salaam

Ml. E. Vawda
for Daarul Iftaa
